name: cc-for-founders
description: A curated collection of Claude Code skills and subagents for startup founders

skills.name: Enriching Sales Contacts
skills.description: Enriches sales contacts from a Google Sheet containing LinkedIn URLs. Uses contact enrichment MCPs and parallel processing for efficiency.

skills.name: Conducting Market Research
skills.description: Researches a product/topic by mining Reddit, Twitter/X, and YouTube for pain points, competitive intelligence, and voice-of-customer data.

skills.name: Planning Feature
skills.description: Guides founders through structured feature planning: problem validation, solution exploration, UX concepts, and technical tradeoffsâ€”all in plain language for non-technical users.

subagents.name: Personal Voice Writer
subagents.description: Write or revise content in a specific person's distinctive voice. Customize with your own writing patterns and examples.

subagents.name: Writing Research Assistant
subagents.description: Research assistant for improving drafts - finds sources, verifies facts, locates citations, and gathers supporting evidence for claims.

subagents.name: Sales Contact Enricher
subagents.description: Enriches sales contacts from LinkedIn URLs using contact enrichment MCPs. Writes to Google Sheets. Designed for parallel batch processing.
